Package ubikesystem

package ubikesystem
  • Class
    Description
    AccountService
    This class represents the account service in the bike sharing system.
    AddRemoveService
    This class provides the functionality to add and remove bikes from a station.
    BikeAreaCheckService
    This class provides the functionality to check bikes in different areas.
    BikeSharingSystem
    This class provides the functionality to add and remove bikes from a station.
    BikeStatusService
    This class provides the functionality to check the status of a bike and change the status of a bike.
    CallMaintenance
    This class provides the functionality to call maintenance for a pillar or a bike.
    CardService
    This class provides the functionality to add money to a card, check the card balance, and view recent transactions.
    CustomException
    The implementation of a custom exception in the system.
    FeeCalculator
    This class calculates the fee for renting a bike.
    MaintenanceService
    This class provides the functionality to manage the maintenance of the bikes.
    RentalService
    This class provides the functionality to add a rental record, get a rental record, and update a rental record.
    RentBorrowService
    This class provides the functionality to rent and borrow bikes.
    StationService
    This class provides the functionality to manage stations.
    UserService
    This class provides the functionality for the user.
